# medium()

**Type Method**

Creates a system detent for a sheet that’s approximately half the height of the screen, and is inactive in compact height.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class func medium() -> Self
```

## Creating a system detent

- **large()**: Creates a system detent for a sheet at full height.

items.description: Creates a system detent for a sheet at full height.
items.name: large()

title: medium()
